div.pre: 889 Beli dol, c. 60 km. E of KÃ¢rdzali, Bul- garia, 1966 Burial: 170-160 B.C. (T) Contents: 68 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 65 late post. tetradr. (Asia Minor mints) Perseus: 2 tetradr. Lysimachus: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Sofia Gerasimov, BIAB 30 (1967), p. 187
